dublin_core.dcvalue: Internet based medical visits or structured e Visits allow patients to report symptoms and seek diagnosis and treatment from their doctor over a secure Web site without calling or visiting the physician s office While acceptability of e Visits has been investigated outcomes associated with e Visits that is whether patients receiving diagnoses receive appropriate care or need to return to the doctor remain unexplored
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
Internet-based medical visit and diagnosis for common medical problems: experience of first user cohort.
